content:
Your PW needs to be a generated app PW - see https://help.yahoo.com/kb/SLN15241.html.

Settings:

IMAP - Server Name: export.imap.mail.yahoo.com - Port: 993 - Connection Security: SSL/TLS - Authentication method: Normal password

SMTP - Server Name: smtp.mail.yahoo.com - Port: 587 - Connection Security: SSL/TLS - Authentication method: Normal password
creator: siffemoz

content: Wellicht staat in Kan geen berichten ontvangen een oplossing.

content: Geeft u wel het wachtwoord van uw e-mailaccount op? Dat is hetzelfde als het gebruikte wachtwoord voor uw webmail.
creator: markh2

content: Označte niektorú správu. Kliknite na klávesu F8 - zobrazí sa obsah správy uspodu Vypnite Thunderbird Zapnite Thunderbird - odteraz sa vám bude obsah označenej správy zobrazovať uspodu (v spodnom okienku)
creator: Ansamb

content: Als u nog toegang hebt tot de inhoud van de oude harde schijf, dan kunt u de gegevens uit de profielmap kopiëren naar de nieuwe PC. Het gaat dan om de bestanden met de .mab extensie. abook.mab is het standaard adresboek.
creator: Mozilla-assistent

content: Hebt u nog wel toegang tot de harde schijf op de oude pc? Dan zou u het oude profiel namelijk kunnen opzoeken en dat naar uw nieuwe Thunderbird kunnen importeren.
creator: markh2

content:
1. Choose Tools -> Developer Tools > Error Console, paste the expression: 
  openDialog("chrome://pippki/content/resetpassword.xhtml")
  1. then, press the Evaluate button. That will open a dialog asking you if you want to reset your password. If Evaluate is not seen, press enter key.
  2. When prompted, press the Reset button.
creator: davidsk

content: That file is in every version of Thunderbird as best I know.
creator: davidsk

content: Thanks David. I did not have this file on my Macbook running Monterey or on my system backup for Sequoia which had Thunderbird 143 installed. However, upon updating to 145, that file was created, too. So, my assumption now would be that it was introduced with either 144 or 145. Can anyone confirm or falsify this?
creator: junknpunk

content: I have no solution to offer, but a suggestion: post the details, such as screenshot of incoming server settings pane and info such as POP or IMAP. SPAM settings are not once-and-done, but need periodic checks for both good and bad messages. That is, thunderbird does not have a blacklist or whitelist.
creator: davidsk

content: This appears to be an issue for Hostgator, if messages work without attachments, but fails when having attachments.
creator: davidsk

content: Both of those addons have caveats in their online documentation on situations where the edit doesn't work. You might also try disabling one or the other in case there is a conflict. If nothing works, I suggest disabling any other addons to ensure no conflict. Finally, write to the authors for assistance.
creator: davidsk

content: click 'new message' button if menu bar is not visible, press the Alt key now, press view>toolbars and tick composition toolbar
creator: davidsk

content:
Thank you David. Just pressing the Alt key did not work...I had to hold it down for a couple of seconds but everything is back to normal now which is fantastic.

But what a bizarre thing to happen!!!

Rose
creator: roseatthegrapevine
